title: 'Easy to use anywhere'
body: 'Small easy to carry and very good battery life so as to cover nearly 3 movies at a stretch. Sound is quite appealing worth buying at this price and one would not repend this buying except the situation if the product is a defective one.'

title: 'Malfunction on bose soundlink flex'
body: Purchased bose soundflex from amazon on the 16th July,2023. Used it for about 2 months 1 week. A week ago, it strated to loss power and switch off by itself when the volume pass it's halfway through. Sometimes, according to the music played it turned out that, it dose'nt cope with the frequency of the sound played and starts an auto switch off. How can it be solved?

title: 'Faulty product.'
body: 'The media could not be loaded. This does not switch on anymore. Worked well for two weeks. One did not expect this from Amazon and Bose'

title: 'Bose is a boss.'
body: 'Value for money. Good investment.'

title: 'Good - Could have been better'
body: The media could not be loaded. The sound is awesome, each and every note is clear, no ambiguous tone and unnecessary crossovers. This is what I love about Bose. Soothing experience as always. Sturdy build. Smooth connectivity.  Note - Bass could have been more refined, sometimes it's just a boom. It's just 2 days that I have listened. Hindustani and carnatic classical sounds great. Pop music has this unecessary enhancement.  Need to check this. Shall update this space after few days of listening.  All in all a great sound companion!!!!

title: 'AWESOME SOUNDS'

title: 'Gives best Value for money'
body: 'Excellent sound. This speaker is good enough even for a house party( for a living room as big as 20*20 ft). It seems to be the best value for money in terms Of output and recommended for all kind of usage indoors/ outdoors.'

title: 'High repairing cost'
body: 'The problem with this brand is very few service centres in India. Repairing cost is almost 70% of price of new unit'

title: 'All rounder with the best experience!!'
body: 'Hey my brother gifted me this speaker about 10 days back and since then I‚Äôve known sound differently. The sound at every volume is very crisp clear and detailed. It‚Äôs light weight easy to carry and decent batter life. You can pair it with two devices at a time and the transition between the two sound outputs is barely noticeable. Haven‚Äôt experimented with the water resistance aspect. Only drawback for me is its Bluetooth range which is ok for an average room but found it difficult in bigger hall and across walls. One of the best buy for my brother and ‚Äògift‚Äô for me. üòõüòá'

title: 'Distorted Sound and Poor Customer Service'
body: I bought it on last December 2022 after 6 months i noticed a distorted sound from the woofer side, i booked repair online on Boss Official site and after a month an exicutive from the company contacted me and told that they can replace the speaker but they don't have the same color (Black) they said only blue is available i said ok anyways I'm getting a new one, i got it after few days then after a month the replaced speaker got same complaint as the previous one, I send it again I don't know what they're gonna do, its almost 2 months now, no reply from custome service, hope I'll get the refund or I'm ready to pay for an upgraded one.

title: 'Great speaker'

title: 'Amazing ü§©ü§©ü§©ü§©ü§©ü§©ü§©'
body: The media could not be loaded. I have always wanted to own a bose system. Earlier I had Sony srs xb33. Undoubtedly it was good too. But despite being water proof, it malfunctioned when it was dropped in bucket of water. Disappointed I took up the chance (financially) to own 1 bose speaker. Well I guess it was the right decision. High, mids and lows everything is well balanced. Bass is good and a lot better than sony srs xb33. If you ask me about cons, as I have used a sony system, I'd say that it should have had a dedicated app for Equalizer settings and would have made more sense if someone wanted to change the audio as per their taste. Sony fulfills this gap I'd say. Another con would be that there are no flashy lights unlike Sony or JBL. Apart from these, the sound signature of bose is astounding. I am literally blown with its highs and mids and faster connectivity. If you have the budget, go for it blindly.  Edit : Another con that is mention worthy is that when I reduce the volume in my phone to less than 25%, the speaker goes mute. So basically the low handling compatibility with the connected device is bad.

title: 'Bose can never go wrong!'
body: 'I‚Äôve been a Bose user for quite some time now. I own the QuietComfort Earbuds II Bose Smart Soundbar 900 and this one. I can guarantee you they never fail to deliver. Don‚Äôt go on the size of this speaker this bad boy sounds BIG for its size! And with what clarity! You‚Äôll get to hear instruments and notes that you‚Äôll never normally hear on other speakers. If you have the money just blindly go for it.'
